body: Embroidered with images of falling stars and pale moons, this item appears to be a normal cloak, but on command its magical properties distort and warp light waves. This displacement works just like the displacement spell and lasts for a total of 15 rounds per day, which the wearer can divide up as she sees fit.
name: Cloak of Displacement, Major
